actions.name: Ocean's Wrath
actions.description: Connection - Aeroblast. Effect: While Rainy or Windy Weather is active, the user's Water-Type and [Wind] attacks gain [Crit 1] (or have their [Crit X] increased by +1) and the user attacks with them as if they have +2 ACC stages.
